hero.title: Get in touch with Ratopia
hero.subtitle: Whether you have questions about adoption, husbandry, or just want to discuss rats in general, you are welcome to reach out.

body.text: The preferred way to reach us is through direct message on our main social platforms or by email. We do not publish a phone number to protect privacy and to avoid being unreachable when handling animals.

items: Location: Singapore / China (depending on project phase)

body.text: When you write, it helps if you include a short self-introduction and what you are looking for (adoption, advice, collaboration, etc.).
